name: R0ven vs Bull3t
description:
Simple fighting game of two battle robots.  This proyect was created with educational purpouses to practise modeling, rigging and animatig in Maya, texturing with Substance Painter and using this resources in a Unity Project with VFX Graph and Shader graph effects.

CONTROLS:

  • Player 1: A,D (move),  Tab/Left Shift (attack),  Q/Left Ctrl (defend).
  • Player 2: Arrows (move), Enter/Right Shift (attack), Backspace/Right Ctrl (defend).
